pageContext.claim: “Yeah, I think it's a better name, Josh, because they said 'universal ballots' and they had 15 different names. Didn't mean -- people said, 'How does that have to do with being universal?' Unsolicited. Eighty million unsolicited ballots being sent all over the place. People are going to get them: 'What the hell is this? What is it?' They'll be harvesting them like crazy.”
pageContext.analysis: A pack of lies. Ballots are being sent to registered voters.
